movies.title: Victory at Entebbe
movies.plot: The film is based on an actual event: Operation Entebbe and the freeing of Israeli hostages at Entebbe Airport (now Entebbe International Airport) in Uganda.
movies.awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 nomination.

events.title: 102 hostages are freed in Operation Thunderbolt at Entebbe airport

movies.title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
movies.plot: Eccentric candy man Willy Wonka prompts a worldwide frenzy when he announces that golden tickets hidden inside five of his delicious candy bars will admit their lucky holders into his top-secret confectionary. But does Wonka have an agenda hidden amid a world of Oompa Loompas and chocolate rivers?
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
